https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wH9sRIpSvCCGcmX8Y4rFW35Vlmz.jpg Don Lázaro is a former gunslinger that has left behind his years of violence to care for his granddaughter, Beatriz. The child suffers a terminal disease and doesn’t have much hope to live. Lázaro is visited by a former friend for an appointment that will decide Beatriz’ future. A la hora marcada
